definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: He is an old journalistic acquaintance.
sentences.chinese: 他是我在新聞界的一位舊交。

sentences.english: My friend for the long four years.
The turn of the age gestates various ideas.
sentences.chinese: 新舊交替的時代造就多元的思想。

sentences.english: Fleet Street is a journalistic center in London.
sentences.chinese: 他是我在新聞界的一位舊交。

sentences.english: New old alternative ages at forward.
A few years ago, Wai Kiu was in a critical moment of transition.
sentences.chinese: 數年前，惠僑正值新舊交替的關鍵時刻。
